alert.note: Alert for Le Sueur; Nicollet; Sibley (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 5:13PM CDT until August 11 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Le Sueur County in south central Minnesota... Southeastern Sibley County in central Minnesota... Northeastern Nicollet County in south central Minnesota... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 513 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arlington, or 25 miles southeast of Hutchinson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Henderson around 525 PM CDT. Le Sueur around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Montgomery and Le Center. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
